mdRecord.dcterms:title: Chronicles of England to 1417 1450
Alderman Brut
Chronicon Regum Angliae
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Chronicles of England, in the vernacular, from Brutus to Henry V, 1417 A.D. (Chronicon Regum Angliae Saec. XV.) Legends of Brutus, King Lear, King Arthur, etc. [original]

Composed in Middle English with marginal notes in an Elizabethan hand. The text is written on vellum with a sloping Gothic hand. Single column with 29-30 lines to the page. Numerous illuminated initials, flourishes and marginal scrolls; bound in 19th century moroccan. [original]
Also available as photocopy and on microfilm reel M-763. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Manuscripts, Medieval
